doc.title: Noor Jannah's Kitchen: Get ready for a Prata BOMB!
doc.text: OK/JJ ,/, get/VB ready/JJ for/IN the/DT next/JJ revolution/NN in/IN Roti/NN Prata/NN ,/, or/CC should/MD I/PRP say/VB Roti/NN Canai/NN ?/. If/NNP Malaysia/NNP Boleh/NNP ,/, then/RB Singapore/NNP lagi/NNP Boleh/NNP ./.
